name: Maxify Product Cart And Options - Shopify App
techStack: ReactJS, NodeJS, ExpressJS, MongoDB, Firebase, Rest Api, GraphQL, Mongoose
detail:
Maxify - Product & Cart is the ultimate app for tailoring product options and variant selections to suit any scenario. Need to apply a gift-wrapping fee for expedited processing? With Maxify, it's a breeze! 
 ● Limitless options in your products page 
● Create additional dropdown for your product 
 ● Easy color swatches 
 ● Apply gift wrapping fee 
● File upload on your product page

name: Save You Penny
